member.name: IP_ADAPTER_MULTICAST_ADDRESS
member.summary: TheIP_ADAPTER_MULTICAST_ADDRESS structure stores a single multicast address in a linked-list of addresses for a particular adapter.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_MULTICAST_ADDRESS.Alignment
member.summary: Reserved. Used by the compiler to align the structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_MULTICAST_ADDRESS.Length
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of this structure.

summary.para: A set of flags for this multicast IP address.
The following table shows possible values. These constants are defined in the Iptypes.h header file.

listheader.description: The IP address is legal to appear in DNS.
The IP address is a cluster address and should not be used by most applications.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_MULTICAST_ADDRESS.Next
member.summary: A pointer to the next multicast IP address structure in the list.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_MULTICAST_ADDRESS.Address
member.summary: The IP address for this multicast IP address entry. This member can be an IPv6 address or an IPv4 address.
